# Functions

## Harmonise police force name

```{r}
harmonise_force <- function (force_name) {
  force_name %>% 
    str_replace_all(" & ", " and ") %>% 
    str_to_title() %>% 
    str_replace_all("And", "and") %>% 
    str_replace_all("Of", "of") %>% 
    str_replace("London, City of", "City of London") %>% 
    str_replace("Police", "")
}
```
